mapper.sql: r_id AS id, r_name AS roomName, r_room_nature_id AS natureId, r_room_model_id AS roomModelId, r_floor_id AS floorId, r_area AS area, r_state AS state, r_create_user_id AS createUserId, r_create_time AS createTime
mapper.select: SELECT r.r_id AS id, r.r_name AS roomName, f.f_name AS floorName, unit.u_name AS unitName, b.b_name AS buildingName, c.c_name AS communityName, p.p_name AS projectName, (SELECT count( ar.ar_id ) FROM vi_authorize_room ar LEFT JOIN vi_authorize a ON a.a_id = ar.ar_authorize_id WHERE ar.ar_room_id = r.r_id AND a.a_user_id = #{id} AND a.a_type = 1 GROUP BY ar.ar_room_id) AS passwordCount, (SELECT count( ar.ar_id ) FROM vi_authorize_room ar LEFT JOIN vi_authorize a ON a.a_id = ar.ar_authorize_id WHERE ar.ar_room_id = r.r_id AND a.a_user_id = #{id} AND a.a_type = 3 GROUP BY ar.ar_room_id) AS fpCount, (SELECT count( ar.ar_id ) FROM vi_authorize_room ar LEFT JOIN vi_authorize a ON a.a_id = ar.ar_authorize_id WHERE ar.ar_room_id = r.r_id AND a.a_user_id = #{id} AND a.a_type = 2 GROUP BY ar.ar_room_id) AS cardCount, (SELECT count( ar.ar_id ) FROM vi_authorize_room ar LEFT JOIN vi_authorize a ON a.a_id = ar.ar_authorize_id WHERE ar.ar_room_id = r.r_id AND a.a_user_id = #{id} AND a.a_type = 4 GROUP BY ar.ar_room_id) AS faceCount, (SELECT count( ar.ar_id ) FROM vi_authorize_room ar LEFT JOIN vi_authorize a ON a.a_id = ar.ar_authorize_id WHERE ar.ar_room_id = r.r_id AND a.a_user_id = #{id} AND a.a_type = 5 GROUP BY ar.ar_room_id) AS bluetoothCount FROM vi_room r LEFT JOIN vi_floor f ON r.r_floor_id = f.f_id LEFT JOIN vi_unit unit ON f.f_unit_id = unit.u_id LEFT JOIN vi_building b ON unit.u_building_id = b.b_id LEFT JOIN vi_community c ON b.b_community_id = c.c_id LEFT JOIN vi_project p ON c.c_project_id = p.p_id INNER JOIN vi_room_user ru ON ru.ru_room_id = r.r_id WHERE ru.ru_user_id = #{id}

select r_id as id, r_name as name from vi_room where 1 = 1
and r_floor_id = #{id}
SELECT rm.rm_id AS id, rm.rm_name AS modelName FROM vi_room_model rm

select
from vi_room where r_name = #{roomName} and r_floor_id = #{floorId} limit 1

select
from vi_room where r_id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into vi_room(r_name, r_room_nature_id, r_room_model_id, r_floor_id, r_area, r_state, r_create_user_id, r_create_time) values (#{roomName}, #{natureId}, #{roomModelId}, #{floorId}, #{area}, #{state}, #{createUserId}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: update vi_room set r_state = #{state} where r_id = #{id}

update vi_room
r_name = #{roomName},
r_room_nature_id = #{natureId},
r_room_model_id = #{roomModelId},
r_floor_id = #{floorId},
r_area = #{area},
r_state = #{state},
r_update_time = #{updateTime},
r_id = #{id}
